description:
Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

app_name: Too Good To Go: End Food Waste
description:
Too Good To Go is your smart way to enjoy tasty food at great value, while doing good for the planet. Winner of the 2023 ‘Cultural Impact’ category at the prestigious Apple App Store Awards, the #1 app to reduce food waste helps you save delicious, unsold snacks, meals, and ingredients from local shops, cafés, supermarkets, restaurants, and top brands—all at great prices. 

In a world where 40% of food produced goes to waste each year, reducing food waste is the #1 action we can take to help tackle climate change. With Too Good To Go, you can unlock affordable meals and grocery items while helping to save the planet. Together, we have the power to make a real difference.



HOW TOO GOOD TO GO WORKS:

EXPLORE AND DISCOVER
Download the app to explore a map showing nearby restaurants, cafés, bakeries, supermarkets or trusted brands offering good food at a great price, ready to be rescued.

SAVE YOUR SURPRISE BAG OR TOO GOOD TO GO PARCEL
Browse a variety of Surprise Bags filled with tasty, unsold food—whether it’s sushi, pizza, burgers, or fresh fruits and veggies. Prefer to get your favourite food brands delivered to you? Save a Too Good To Go Parcel packed with good food from the brands you love, at great prices. 

AFFORDABLE EATS
Save a Surprise Bag or a Too Good To Go Parcel at ½ price or less. 

RESERVE YOUR SAVE
Confirm your purchase through the app to reserve your Surprise Bag and rescue these delicious meals from going to waste. By rescuing food, you save money and help fight food waste.

ENJOY
Collect your Surprise Bag at the scheduled time, or have your Too Good To Go Parcel delivered directly to you.


WHY TOO GOOD TO GO?:

WALLET-FRIENDLY INDULGENCE
Enjoy quality meals at affordable prices, satisfying both your taste buds and your wallet.

VARIETY AND CHOICE
Too Good To Go partners with a wide selection of local favourites and top brands, offering everything from sushi, pizza, baked and fresh goods to easy-to-store staple grocery items such as snacks, drinks, sweets or pasta.

ENVIRONMENTAL IMPACT
Each meal saved avoids CO2e emissions and the unnecessary use of water and land resources. By rescuing food from going to waste, you take a step towards a greener, cleaner planet. 

EASY PURCHASE PROCESS
The app’s simple and user-friendly interface makes it easy to browse, choose, and save Surprise Bags or Too Good To Go Parcels.

CONVENIENCE
Pick up your Surprise Bag at the designated time, or have a Too Good To Go Parcel delivered directly to you.

JOIN THE TOO GOOD TO GO COMMUNITY
Join the community of food lovers making a positive impact on the environment. Download the app now and start reducing food waste, bite by bite. 
Reducing food waste is a key action to help tackle climate change. For more information, visit tgtg.to/claims

With the Takeaway.com app, you can order whatever you love, wherever you are. With a wide variety of restaurants, supermarkets and convenience stores to choose from, you can enjoy everything from burgers, pizza, pasta, sushi, salads and loads more, and get it all delivered to your door.

Need some bits from the supermarket? Just open the app, choose ‘groceries’ and fill your basket. Whether it’s baby food, flowers, beer, wine, beauty products, ice cream, chocolate, milk, fruit and bread, our partners have it all.

How it works:
Ordering is easy. You can either pick a saved address, fill in your postcode/street name or let the app find your location automatically. You can then choose your favourite restaurant or store and select whatever you fancy. 

Follow your order to your doorstep:
Track your order from the kitchen or store straight to your doorstep with our Food Tracker®. We'll even send you push notifications to update you about the status of your order. It usually takes 30-45 minutes to deliver your food or groceries.

What you get with our app:
- Quick and hassle-free ordering
- Great offers and discounts
- Choose to pick up your order at the restaurant or store
- Re-order the same delicious meal with one tap of a button
- Browse grocery stores, cuisines, offers, best-rated restaurants, nearby spots and vegetarian/halal options
- Get regular updates on your order with our handy Food Tracker®
- Choose from multiple payment options

Order from big brands or local heroes. 
Takeaway.com has it all!

Eat smarter. Live healthier.
BiteWatch is your personal guide to healthier eating habits—designed to help you and your family prevent non-communicable diseases through informed food choices. With a quick scan of any food product, BiteWatch reveals what’s inside: from hidden additives to high levels of salt, sugar, and saturated fats that may be harmful to both adults and children.

Whether you're shopping for yourself, your kids, or your loved ones, BiteWatch empowers you to make better, safer decisions at the supermarket. Get real-time insights, discover healthier alternatives, and take control of your nutrition—one bite at a time.

Key Features:
• Scan barcodes to instantly analyze food products
• Spot potentially harmful additives and excess sugar, salt, or fat
• Learn how ingredients impact your long-term health
• Make better choices for your kids’ wellbeing
• Stay informed, shop smarter, and eat with confidence

Welcome to the new official McDonald’s app.

The app is filled with great offers specially tailored to you. Deals and discounts appear regularly so check back often to see what’s new.

The news section keeps you up to date with everything that’s going on in McDonald’s near you. Look here for new games and competitions.

The nutrition section provides information on our entire menu. We provide allergy advice and nutritional information on everything from the Big Mac to a single dip!

Use our restaurant finder to find your nearest McDonald’s. Filter your search based on opening hours, facilities and get directions from wherever you are.

Hungry? Get your favourite meals, takeaways and groceries delivered to your door in minutes with Deliveroo. From local gems to big-name brands, discover thousands of restaurants and supermarkets near you.

ALL YOUR FAVOURITES, DELIVERED:

- Restaurants: Big brands and local gems
- Grocery: Always fresh with our Freshness Promise
- Convenience: Beauty essentials, flowers, gifts, DIY and more in minutes

Order from the restaurants you’re craving...

- Sushi or pizza?
- A Chinese or Indian?
- Burgers, pasta, breakfast or something sweet?

All of your favourites are just a tap away from top brands like KFC, McDonald’s, Burger King, Subway, Nando’s, Wagamama, Popeyes, Papa John’s, Wingstop, Giggling Squid, Kokoro, Pizza Express, Five Guys, Franco Manca, Dishoom, Pho, Taco Bell, Starbucks, Gail's Bakery, Joe & the Juice, GBK and more!

Or Fancy something different? Discover thousands of local gems that deliver right to your door.

£0 DELIVERY FEE WITH DELIVEROO PLUS

Become a member and you’ll also unlock:

- Exclusive offers and member-only deals
- Monthly rewards that help your money go further
- Discounted service fees*
- Earn 10% back on restaurant orders over £30*

*Plus Gold members only

It’s the simplest way to save while enjoying what you love most.

SUPERMARKETS SORTED

Get groceries delivered fast from top supermarkets, including Waitrose, ASDA, Morrisons, M&S, Sainsbury’s, Co-Op, Amazon Fresh, Whole Foods, Spar, One Stop, Iceland and Majestic Wine.

MORE THAN FOOD

We’re here for the everyday essentials and little treats too. From Boots and Healf to Not On The High Street, B&Q, Screwfix, Accessorize and The Perfume Shop, we've got you covered.

WHY CHOOSE DELIVEROO?

- Track every order live from kitchen to doorstep
- Enjoy fast, reliable delivery when it matters
- Order for right now or schedule for later
- Pick up deals you won’t find anywhere else

Download the app today and let us bring the best of your neighbourhood straight to your door.

T&Cs apply. Visit the website for full details.

Quoi de mieux qu’un Quick ? Un Quick avec l’app MyQuick ! 
Grâce à  MyQuick, tes visites en restaurant seront récompensées par des Q-points à échanger contre tes produits Quick préférés ! 
Pas beau ça ?

Comment ça marche ? Tu télécharges l’app et lors de ta prochaine visite chez Quick, tu scannes ton Q-id à la caisse. 
A chaque commande, tu reçois des Q-points directement sur ton compte MyQuick. Après c’est bingo ! Tu échanges tes Q-points contre des savoureux produits Quick ! Rien de plus simple.

Mais ce n’est pas tout ! 
Reçois un savoureux cadeau pour ton annif.
Reçois des Q-points quand tu parraines tes amis.
Et reste au courant de toutes nos promotions et nouveaux produits.

On fait quoi ?
On télécharge !

My Burger King? That’s the application of Burger King Belgium & Luxembourg.

With My Burger King in your pocket, you have all advantages of Burger King with you, all the time!

Advantages, you say?
- For every purchase, you’ll receive our BK Coins. These BK Coins allow you to buy Burger King products.
- New product? New Burger King restaurant? Be the first to be updated on our latest news.
- Hungry? Find the Burger King restaurant closest to you in Belgium & Luxembourg
- And possibly you can score a coupon or two…

Download My Burger King, register and receive your first BK Coins already.

//The most downloaded wine cellar management app in 2025!
Oeni helps you manage your wine cellar/collection and recommend the best wine at the best time (peak). Whether you're a seasoned collector or a casual wine lover, Oeni offers comprehensive tools to easily manage your wine inventory.

//Master your inventory at your fingertips
Oeni tracks the history of your cellar, its stock, and aging with precision and simplicity.

- Discover our immersive 3D wine cellar feature to easily visualize and organize your bottles, as if you were there!
- Scan and add your bottles quickly: With a directory of more than 400,000 bottles, including majestic wines, adding your wines to the Oeni cellar only takes a few seconds. Our application has similar performance to other well-known wine apps such as Vivino, VinoCell, Invintory, wine-searcher or CellarTracker.
- Specify their vintage: By adding the vintage of your bottles, Oeni will be able to recommend the ideal time to open them.
- Enter their purchase price: The purchase price of your bottles is a crucial element for tracking your expenses and investments over time.
- Monitor your stock: Oeni allows you to know your stock accurately and will help you manage it over time. Your cellar will no longer have any secrets for you.
- Analyze their aging: Follow the aging phases of each of your bottles to know their maturity level and peak date.
- Enjoy with the right dish: Oeni recommends food and wine pairings with over 5,000 dishes so you don't miss any tasting.
- Analyze Aging: Follow the aging phases of your wines to determine their maturity and peak dates. Oeni’s vino wine scanner feature helps you understand the aging process better.

//Track the financial value of your cellar
Oeni analyzes the price of each bottle and follows its evolution over time.

- Measure your expenses: Analyze your expenses month by month, year by year, to understand and adapt your budget.
- Know the value of your cellar: Every month, Oeni retrieves the market price of your bottles to continuously update the value of your cellar.
- Track your capital gains: Oeni informs you of your real-time capital gains and bottle by bottle, so you don't miss anything.
- Expense Analysis: Monitor your expenses month by month and year by year to better understand and manage your budget.
- Value Tracking: Oeni updates the market price of your bottles monthly, providing an accurate valuation of your cellar. Our wine reviews cellar feature keeps you informed about the current market trends.
- Capital Gains Monitoring: Stay informed about your real-time capital gains on each bottle to optimize your collection.

//A personal and intelligent sommelier
Oeni manages your wine cellar and recommends the right wine at the right time.

- Food and Wine Pairings: Choose from over 5,400 food and wine pairings to find the perfect pairing for any meal. Oeni will make recommendations as relevant, or even more relevant, than other apps like Vivino, cellartracker or Wine Scanner to provide you with the best recommendations.
- Refine your search by specifying the occasion: "an everyday wine," "a nice dinner with friends," or "for special occasions."
- Oeni will then analyze your wine cellar to find the perfect match based on food and wine pairings, the aging phases of your bottles, and their market value.
- Oeni offers its selection of bottles with a recommendation percentage for each of them. All you have to do is choose.

Additional Features :
- Extensive Wine Database: Access a database of over 400,000 bottles and 2,400 appellations.
- Detailed Wine Information: Get complete details on each bottle, including wine reviews and ratings
- Best cellar management tool for wine collection

More information on the terms of use and the privacy policy
- Privacy policy: https://oeni.app/en/politique-de-confidentialite/
- Terms of use: https://oeni.app/en/conditions-generales-dutilisation/

The new O'TACOS OFFICIAL application offers you new services:

- Click&collect : prepare your order and pick it up in the restaurant of your choice
- Find the restaurant closest to you

New features will be available soon, stay tuned

HelloFresh is a food recipe Box delivery service, developed to be your weekly meal planner.

HelloFresh lets you choose from a wide range of recipes to create the perfect menu that delivers just the right amount of ingredients you need for cooking deliciously easy meals from scratch. You can say goodbye to the need to create your own weekly meal planner, spend less time queuing at the supermarket and relying on food delivery apps, and start cooking tasty, fresh and easy meals from the comfort of your kitchen.

Cooking tasty, wholesome meals has never been easier. Every week, HelloFresh delivers a recipe Box full of your chosen menu of recipes and fresh, quality ingredients. Use our meal planner app to pick your weekly menu of easy meals and explore a wide range of tasty food recipes. You can look forward to cooking a variety of dishes, including Calorie Smart meals under 650 calories, Rapid recipes ready in 20 minutes and tasty vegetarian options. With the HelloFresh recipe Box, there's something to suit plenty of lifestyles and tastes.


How does HelloFresh work?

1. Our weekly meal planner app helps you create the perfect menu and easily cook tasty recipes from scratch. From Veggie recipes to quick meals, globally inspired flavours and more, there's so much to choose. Simply select your recipes based on your household size and food preference. Plus, you can round out your Box with a delicious selection of food from our expanded menu, including sides, desserts, breakfast and more.
2. Meal prep and meal planning delivered: Enjoy step-by-step recipe cards and the fresh ingredients you need to get cooking, with your Box delivered straight to your door. Plus, you can take back your evenings with fewer trips to the supermarket, pre-planned meals, and little clean up.
3. Delicious and wholesome dinners: You can enjoy cooking up tasty food that everyone at the kitchen table will love. A menu tailored to your taste, every week!

Other reasons to love the HelloFresh food recipe Box:

With HelloFresh, you can spend less time shopping for food in the supermarket, thanks to the handy weekly recipe Box deliveries. No more wondering about what you'll be cooking every week or spending time thinking about your meal planner - with easy, tasty and fresh recipes delivered. Instead, you can spend more time doing the things you love.

Bite into quality food: We prioritise sourcing local products so only fresh, seasonal ingredients make it on to the menu and into your recipe Box, ready for cooking up tasty food and meals that are packed full of flavour.

Waste less food: HelloFresh customers waste 21% less food than those buying from supermarkets, thanks to ingredients for recipes being measured in just the right amounts.

What will you find on the HelloFresh meal planner app?

100+ recipes per month that you can discover, add to your menu, rate and share tasty food with your friends and family.

Handy recipe timers and step-by-step guides to help with cooking your tasty meals.

A flexible online account where you can easily choose your recipes or change the subscription settings by 11:59 PM, five days prior to your delivery. Plus, it’s easy to skip a week or cancel if your food plans for the week change.

There’s no longer a need for a meal planner, with HelloFresh we will handle the meal prep, so you can enjoy cooking tasty recipes and eating delicious food!

What our customers are saying:

" Life changing - HelloFresh has showed me that you can cook good food made from local produce (and at the end of a long day at work) . Worth every penny. " @MJACuteFace
" Food is amazing every time. Takes the stress out of meal planning and shopping- thoroughly recommend it, as does my entire family!" @Alexa rosy

It's time to get cooking and enjoy fresh, tasty meals with the HelloFresh Recipe Box. Leave the meal planning to us!

Onze Panos app, da’s om van te smullen.
Spaar voor gratis beloningen!
Speel je klantenkaart niet meer kwijt in je bodemloze handtas of tussen al je andere kaarten in de portemonnee. Onze Panos-app heb je dicht bij jou op jouw smartphone, altijd en overal.
De voordelen?
Je kan de app scannen bij elke aankoop in een Panos City winkel. Voor elke euro krijg je 10 punten!
In ruil voor je gespaarde punten krijg je lekkere gratis beloningen.
Geniet als trouwe app-klant van exclusieve kortingen!
Benieuwd naar wat we voor jou in petto hebben? Download de app.

Met de Pizza Hut-app ben je altijd één klik verwijderd van jouw favoriete pizza’s! Bestel snel en makkelijk online, bewaar je favoriete bestellingen en krijg toegang tot exclusieve aanbiedingen. Blijf op de hoogte van je bestelling en geniet van unieke voordelen. Probeer het vandaag nog!

Foodbag, dé Belgische maaltijdbox

Met Foodbag zet je de lekkerste gerechten op tafel: zelf bereid of kant-en-klaar, voor het hele gezin, voor jou alleen of voor een gezellig etentje met vrienden. Met verse ingrediënten van lokale leveranciers. Kies elke week uit 35 gerechten in 5 kookstijlen. Van klassiek met een twist of vegetarisch tot werelds, lekker makkelijk of zelfs kant-en-klaar. 

Bij Foodbag is een abonnement niet verplicht. Flexibiliteit staat voorop. Je kan één keer bestellen en meteen afrekenen of kiezen voor een wekelijks of tweewekelijks abonnement.

Onze eigen, goedlachse Foodbag-chauffeurs bezorgen je maaltijdbox gekoeld bij je thuis, in Vlaanderen, Brussel en Wallonië. Op vrijdag, zaterdag, zondag of maandag.

Met deze app kun jij:

    - Elke week bestellen voor donderdag 9u. Je kan tot 4 weken vooruit bestellen.
    - Jouw favoriete gerechten selecteren. Kies elke week 3 tot 6 gerechten en kies hoeveel porties van elk gerecht je wil bestellen.
    - Je Foodbag-levering plannen. Kies een leverdag en tijdslot dat voor jou het beste uitkomt. 
    - Je account beheren. Wijzig je bestelling of levering voor donderdag 9u. 
    - Je punten beheren: bij iedere bestelling kan je punten verdienen. Die kan je inruilen voor mooie kortingen of handige keukentools.


Kies elke week uit 5 kookstijlen

    - Quick & Easy: kindvriendelijke en toegankelijke gerechten die een ode brengen aan onze (snelle) Belgische klassiekers. Voor wie niet veel tijd heeft, maar wel veel goesting.
    - Original: een culinaire reis rond de wereld, maar evengoed Belgische klassiekers met een twist. Voor wie houdt van vernieuwing, inspiratie en verrassende combinaties.
    - Sana: Gerechten die je net dat tikkeltje beter doen voelen. Samengesteld, geproefd en goedgekeurd volgens de Sanamethode door voedingsdeskundige Sandra Bekkari. Altijd minstens 50% groenten.
    - Veggie: Meer dan ‘met groentjes’. Herkenbare bordjes voor doorwinterde veggies, aarzelende flexitariërs of vleeseters die zin hebben in ‘eens iets anders’.
    - Kant & Klaar: Geen zin of tijd om te koken. Kies voor onze vers bereide kant-en-klare maaltijden voor in de (microgolf)oven. Gezonder, met groentjes en lokale ingrediënten.

Unlock your home's full potential with HomeID.


HomeID, formerly NutriU, is your all-in-one app for meal planning and prep, with a variety of healthy and delicious recipes to explore. It's your companion for delicious Airfryer recipes and meals - from breakfast to dinner, healthy snacks, and delightful coffee breaks. Collaborating with home cooks, professional chefs, baristas, and Philips Kitchen Appliances, HomeID elevates daily routines into enjoyable experiences with:
• A vast array of easy recipes for every meal and occasion, including snacks, main courses, desserts, brunches, hot drinks, and more. Explore a world of homemade culinary delights.
• Detailed nutritional information for each recipe, empowering you to make informed choices for yourself and your loved ones.
• Diverse culinary options catering to all preferences, such as pasta, casseroles, chicken dishes, cheesecakes, and an extensive selection of vegan and vegetarian choices.
• Instructional videos, expert advice, and integrated features for Philips kitchen appliances, covering Airfryers, coffee/espresso machines, pasta makers, blenders, juicers, Air Steam Cookers, and All-in-One Cookers.
• Tips for crafting the perfect espresso or a simple caramel latte, bringing barista-level coffee into your home.
• A community dedicated to finding joy in the small things amid busy schedules.
• Plus, you can now purchase home appliances directly from your HomeID app.


HomeID - Your Comprehensive Home Appliance App.
Maximize your capabilities with HomeID. Suitable for new appliance owners and seasoned users, HomeID unveils the full potential of your home.
Embrace simplicity in your daily life. Join us at HomeID.

With 65 million users, Vivino is the world’s largest wine app and marketplace empowering people everywhere to enjoy wine to the fullest. Vivino provides wine drinkers access to unbiased information about wine from a community of millions. 

HOW IT WORKS
• Take a photo of any wine label or restaurant wine list or search by wine 
• Instantly see a wine’s rating, reviews, price, tasting notes, and suggested food pairings 
• Get your favorite bottles delivered to your door
• Add your ratings and reviews 
• Easily keep track of wines you like and discover new recommendations 
• Save the bottles you buy in your cellar, so you always know what you have on hand 
• Buy the right wine every time! 

VIVINO PREMIUM
Level up your wine game with...
• Our full scanning suite, including rapid-fire scanning so you can compare countless bottles within seconds
• Exact “match for you” scores for every single wine
• By-the-bottle insights into whether you usually like, loathe, or have never explored a wine style, grape, region
• Wine adventures to taste and play your way through Italy, Bordeaux, and beyond

STATS AT A GLANCE 
• 65 million app downloads and climbing 
• 16 million wines and counting from 245,000+ wineries 
• Millions of unbiased ratings and reviews 
• Hundreds of thousands of wines available for purchase in 18 markets worldwide  

KEY FEATURES
• Unbiased Ratings & Reviews: Leverage reviews and ratings from the world’s largest community of wine drinkers to always select the best wine. 
• Wine Buying Made Easy: Conveniently buy wine directly from the Vivino app. 
• Personalized Recommendations: Discover more wines you will love through Vivino’s wine recommendation engine that only suggests wines we know you will love based on your unique scanning, rating, and purchase behaviour, and community ratings. 
• Quick Compare: Pick the best wine on the shelf by scanning multiple wine labels in seconds to instantly view ratings, region, price, and food pairings all on one page. 
• Wine List Scanner: Select the right wine every time from any restaurant’s entire wine list. 
• Taste Characteristics: Know what the wine you’re eyeing tastes like before buying it. Taste Characteristics aggregates the most commonly used words to describe wines.
• Taste Profile: Track and organize your wines to determine your taste profile, discover new wines, and see how you rank against friends and the Vivino community.

Privacy policy: https://www.vivino.com/privacy
Terms of use: https://www.vivino.com/terms

Please note that we are not able to reply to comments or questions left in App Store reviews. If you have any support-related inquiries or need assistance, please contact support@vivino.com

Alles voor de boodschappen bij Jumbo, in je broekzak
Met de vernieuwde Jumbo app doe je nóg slimmer boodschappen. Of je nu thuis bestelt of in de winkel staat, je hebt alles bij de hand: van je boodschappenlijst tot je Jumbo Extra’s pas. Ontdek het gemak van online bestellen en spaar punten voor gratis Extra’s. Je profiteert van de service, ruime keuze en topkwaliteit producten tegen lage prijzen, die je van ons gewend bent.

Dit kun je allemaal met de Jumbo app:

Slim en snel boodschappen doen
- Blijf op de hoogte van alle aanbiedingen én alle voordelen van Jumbo Extra’s
- Bekijk uitgebreide productinformatie van ons volledige assortiment
- Bestel eenvoudig je boodschappen online 
- Gebruik je boodschappenlijst, handig voor online bestellen én in de winkel

Alle voordelen van Jumbo Extra’s
- Scan je (digitale) Extra’s pas, spaar punten en wissel ze in.
- Bekijk je puntensaldo
- Alle producten waarop je punten spaart in één overzicht
- Wissel je punten in voor de leukste extra’s
- Spaar digitaal zegels voor onze spaaracties
- Activeer en profiteer wekelijks van 6 persoonlijke aanbiedingen

Inspiratie en gemak
- Kies uit meer dan 20.000 simpele, betaalbare en vooral lekkere recepten
- Bewaar je favoriete producten en recepten in Mijn Jumbo
- Bekijk elke week onze nieuwe folder
- Zie wat jij eerder gekocht hebt in je ‘Eerder gekocht’ lijstje

Jouw mening telt
We verbeteren onze app continu. Heb je een tip of vraag? Neem contact op met onze klantenservice, zie www.jumbo.com/contact.

Deze applicatie maakt gebruik van cookies (uitlezen van gegevens van je apparaat). Verder worden er met behulp van de applicatie ook op andere wijze persoonsgegevens over jou verzameld. Als je er voor kiest om deze applicatie te downloaden en te gebruiken ga je er mee akkoord dat we i) deze cookies plaatsen en we daarmee ook persoonsgegevens verzamelen en ii) we op andere wijze persoonsgegevens over jou verzamelen. Op deze manier krijgen we een goed beeld van jou als gebruiker en kunnen we aanbiedingen doen die voor jou interessant zijn. Wil je meer lezen over cookies en de wijze waarop we jouw persoonsgegevens gebruiken? Klik dan op de hieronder opgenomen link ‘Privacybeleid’ die verwijst naar het cookie statement en het privacy statement van Jumbo. Of ga naar: www.jumbo.com/service/cookies-privacy

Experience the world of Nespresso on your iPhone or iPad.

•	Stay up to date with the latest Nespresso Limited Edition coffees
•	Discover the nearest Nespresso points of interest on the store locator (Nespresso Boutiques, retail stores selling Nespresso coffee machines, and coffee capsule recycling points)
Do even more with the app with one of our ‘connected’ machines:
•	Get notified when your capsule stock is running low to ensure you never run out 
•	Navigate through recipes to nurture your inner barista
•	Ensure the best coffee experience cup after cup through regular notifications from your machine on when descaling is needed, or the water tank is nearly empty

Take advantage of our extensive delivery services*, such as:
•	Free Standard or Pick Up Point delivery on purchases of coffee capsules and machines

TheFork is Europe’s leading restaurant booking platform, proudly bringing people together through unique and affordable culinary experiences since 2007. What are you waiting for? Activate your location and we’ll activate your taste buds! You set the tone, we set the table.

TheFork continues to be savoured across the biggest foodie hotspots in France, Spain, Italy, the UK, the Netherlands, Belgium, Switzerland, Portugal, Denmark, and Sweden. But wait, what exactly do we bring to the table? Here are 6 reasons to download TheFork app right now.

1. Things that tickle our taste buds: fast, free and easy online booking
We know that normal life means having a lot on your plate, so to make things a bit easier for you, we've simplified restaurant booking. With a few simple taps on our mobile app, you’ll be one step closer to having that ‘mmm’ moment of pure belly satisfaction, in the most seamless way possible.

2. Frugal on prices, never on flavours
Our amazing restaurant partners love their diners as much as we love ours and offer exclusive discounts on reservations throughout the year (automatically applied and subject to conditions at the time of booking). That way restaurants get to open their doors to all types of diners, making dining out accessible to everyone.

3. Community insights = better bites
Tuck into the wisdom of our gourmet community! With over 20 million trusted reviews from only customers who have actually tried the restaurant—your palette is in good hands!

4. We don’t skimp on choice
Reserved? Not us. That’s just a label for a table. So whether you’re looking for the perfect spot for bottomless brunching, taco crunching or al-fresco munching, our foodies are spoiled for choice with our diverse collection of over 60,000 restaurants and 40,000 photos, menus and community reviews that will satisfy just about any culinary mood and occasion. After all, variety is the spice of life! Browse, scroll and add to favourites, so you can find more of what you love. Now that’s food for thought.

5. We take loyalty VERY seriously
To reward our awesome foodie community, every booking with TheFork accumulates unique Yums points, which can be redeemed in the form of a tasty discount at one of our many partner restaurants down the line. Here’s how it works:

1 reservation = 100 Yums (Y)

Once you've accumulated enough you can enjoy amazing offers which converts to: 
1000 Yums = £20 loyalty discount!
2000 Yums = £50 loyalty discount!

Keep an eye out for Double Yums and other ways to earn more Yums as you book.

We love hearing from our TheFork foodie community! Reach out at contact@thefork.com.

>In the UK, follow us on:
- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/TheFork.uk/
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thefork_uk/?hl=en

The Official Thermomix® Cookidoo® App gives you access to the growing universe of mouth-watering Thermomix® Guided Cooking recipes. You pick and choose which recipes go with you wherever you are. Create an account and get cooking!


SMART @ HEART
Connect to Cookidoo® and access over 100,000 worldwide recipes directly from your app and through the screen of the Thermomix® TM6. Also, be sure to check out the exclusive step-by-step photos and videos, making cooking easier than ever.


YOUR THERMOMIX® COOKIDOO® ACCOUNT
To use the app, you need to have your Thermomix® Cookidoo® username and password. Your local Thermomix® Cookidoo® website will tell you how to create your account for the app.


GET INSPIRED
Wondering what to cook today? Discover hundreds of ideas for every taste, season and occasion! With Cookidoo® membership, you get instant access to every recipe on Cookidoo®. Everything’s on the menu! Our recipe suggestions and articles will point you in the right direction.
 
 
CREATED RECIPES
Discover our newest Cookidoo® feature! You can create, import and modify your favourite recipes, save them all in one place and cook them with your Thermomix®. Your Thermomix®, your way.


PLAN AND COOK
Planning is easy and fun, add recipes to your planner and find the recipes ready for cooking when you need them. The Cook Today button on each recipe lets you schedule a recipe with a single click.


MAKE IT YOUR OWN
Create your own recipe lists to manage your recipes the way you want. Bookmark any recipe you find appealing so you can find it later. You can also view recipes you scheduled in the past.
 
 
COOK-KEY® BRINGS GUIDED COOKING TO YOUR FINGER TIPS
Cook-Key® connects your Thermomix® TM5 to Cookidoo®. Enjoy sending your recipe favourites, weekly plan and recipe collections from the iOS App to your Thermomix®.

Factor Makes Eating Well Easy — and Delicious
With 40+ weekly meals and a constantly upgraded menu featuring high-protein meals, Factor takes the stress out of healthy eating. Our chef-crafted, dietitian-approved meals are delivered fresh (never frozen) and ready to heat in just 2 minutes—so you can spend more time enjoying your food and less time cooking and cleaning.


A Rotating Menu to Match Your Lifestyle

From satisfying entrées to snacks, shakes, and desserts, our ever-expanding menu gives you the flexibility to personalize your weekly box. Whether you're keto, calorie-smart, or protein plus, there's always something new to love.


Why Choose Factor?

Ready in 2 Minutes: No prep, no mess—just heat and eat.
Dietitian Approved, Chef-Made: All meals are crafted to support your health goals without sacrificing flavor.

Made to Match Your Diet: Choose from keto, calorie smart, and protein plus plans.

DISCOVER WECHEF: YOUR ALL-IN-ONE RECIPE & MEAL COMPANION

WeChef transforms the way you cook, plan, and explore new dishes. From turning leftovers into something exciting, to saving recipes from the web, or organizing meals for special occasions – WeChef makes cooking easier, more fun, and stress-free. It’s your go-to partner for creating tasty, well-organized, and unforgettable meals.

SEARCH RECIPES BY INGREDIENTS
Turn your fridge into inspiration! Just enter what you have on hand, and WeChef will suggest creative recipes that help you minimize waste and maximize flavor. From veggies sitting in the fridge to random pantry staples – transform them into meals you’ll actually love. Cooking smarter has never been this easy.

IMPORT RECIPES FROM THE WEB
Spotted a great recipe online? Simply paste the link into WeChef, and it will pull in the ingredients, steps, and photos for you. Build your own personalized recipe library with favorites from across the web and keep everything organized in one place. Never lose track of your go-to recipes again!

DIGITIZE RECIPES WITH THE SCANNER
Bring your handwritten notes, cookbooks, or magazine clippings into the digital age. With WeChef’s smart OCR scanner, you can convert family recipes or PDFs into editable, searchable text – and keep those culinary treasures safe forever, accessible anytime, anywhere.

MOOD-BASED RECIPE SUGGESTIONS
Not sure what you’re craving? Just tell WeChef how you feel, and get recipe ideas that match your mood. Comfort food, quick & healthy bites, or festive treats – WeChef’s smart algorithm makes sure you always land on the perfect dish.

SIMPLIFIED MEAL PLANNING
Plan your meals like a pro! Add recipes to your calendar, generate shopping lists, and even set reminders so dinner is always on time. Whether you’re prepping for the week or planning a family feast, WeChef keeps everything organized and stress-free.

SURPRISE MODE FOR ADVENTUROUS COOKS
Feeling spontaneous? Let WeChef surprise you with a random recipe! Explore new cuisines, rediscover old favorites, and add some excitement to your meals. Who knows what delicious adventure awaits?

EFFORTLESS PORTION ADJUSTMENTS
Cooking for one or feeding a crowd? WeChef automatically adjusts recipe quantities for perfect portions every time. No more guessing or wasted ingredients – just accurate, reliable measurements tailored to your needs.

INTERACTIVE RECIPE ORGANIZER
Save and organize your recipes beautifully. Sort by type, occasion, or rating, add personal notes and photos, and find your favorites in seconds. Your collection has never looked this good – or been this easy to use.

ADVANCED RECIPE SEARCH
Looking for something specific? Search by name, ingredient, category, or dietary need. Whether it’s a gluten-free dinner, a quick breakfast, or a clever way to use leftovers, WeChef helps you find exactly what you need in no time.

WHY CHOOSE WECHEF
WeChef isn’t just another recipe app – it’s your personal kitchen assistant. From inspiration and planning to cooking and sharing, it makes every step of the journey easier, more fun, and more delicious. Say goodbye to the daily “What’s for dinner?” struggle, and hello to endless possibilities.

WE’D LOVE YOUR FEEDBACK
Your opinion helps us grow! Share your ideas, suggestions, or feedback at support@wechef.site and help shape the future of WeChef. Together, we’ll make cooking even more inspiring and stress-free.

Laat elke dag smaken met de app van Dagelijkse kost. 
Maak een gratis profiel aan of meld je aan met je bestaande VRT-profiel en krijg toegang tot alle recepten van Dagelijkse kost in één handige app. 




Swipe & ontdek dagelijkse nieuwe recepten
Swipe van recept naar recept en geef je ogen de kost. Iets gezien dat je lekker vindt? Swipe naar rechts. Niet jouw smaak? Swipe naar links. Zo eenvoudig is het. 




Bewaar je favoriete recepten
Verzamel al je favoriete recepten in je eigen collecties en deel ze met je familie, huisgenoten of vrienden.



Personaliseer je startpagina
Eet je vegetarisch of glutenvrij? Duid je wensen aan in de app en krijg recepten en tips geserveerd die passen bij jouw smaak en persoonlijke voorkeuren. 


Plan je weekmenu
Plan je maaltijden met gemak en stel makkelijk een weekmenu samen met je favoriete recepten. Vanaf nu is het gedaan met de vraag “wat eten we vandaag?”



Laat je boodschappenlijstjes maken
Goesting gevonden? Bespaar tijd en vermijd dat je iets vergeet door je boodschappenlijstje te laten samenstellen in de app op basis van je geselecteerde recepten.



Stap-voor-stap instructievideo’s
Tijd om de keuken in te duiken? Volg moeiteloos elk recept dankzij onze handige video’s en gedetailleerde instructies. Zo maak je lekkere dagelijkse kost die altijd lukt.



Beoordeel en deel recepten
Kookte je iets fantastisch? Gaf je een heerlijke twist aan een recept? Deel je ervaring met andere gebruikers. Geef een duimpje, laat een reactie achter, voeg een foto toe en deel het recept op sociale media.



Download de app nu en sluit je aan bij de grootste kookcommunity van Vlaanderen. 

Volg Dagelijkse kost ook op
Facebook: www.facebook.com/Dagelijkskoken
Instagram: www.instagram.com/dagelijksekostbe
Pinterest: www.pinterest.com/dagelijksekost
